name: Project Virus
description:
Isometric shooter.

1984. A special-purpose group "the Shadow" breaks into a secret facility in Alaska. You have to hack the computer.

System requirements:
processor: Intel (R) Pentium (R) 4415u, 2.3 GHz
video card: Intel® HD Graphics 610
RAM: 250 MB
hard disk space: 210 MB
OS: Windows 10
